hr.fer.zemris.ml.training.decision_tree.split

Class AbstractSplitCriterion<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.ml.training.decision_tree.split.AbstractSplitCriterion<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the target value, usually String for classification and Double for function approximation tasks.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISplitCriterion<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractClassificationSplitCriterion, SDReduction

    public abstract class AbstractSplitCriterion<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISplitCriterion<T>
    Abstract class for different split criteria. All criteria share the same code that evaluates something on every possible split and that functionality is extracted here.
    Author:
    Dan

        Description copied from interface: ISplitCriterion
        Returns the best split of given samples considering only features whose indices are also given.
        Specified by:
        getBestSplit in interface ISplitCriterion<T>
        Parameters:
        samples - samples to split into 2 sets
        featureIndices - indices of features to consider for a split
